question: What is the amount of financial package released by the Centre for 'India COVID-19 Emergency Response and Health System Preparedness Package', to the states/UTs?
explanation:
The Union Government has approved Rs. 15,000 crores for \'India COVID-19 Emergency Response and Health System Preparedness Package\' for states/UTs.
This package which has been approved to build the health infrastructure, will be provided in three phases â€” January 2020 to June 2020, July 2020 to March 2021 and April 2021 to March 2024. This fund would be divided on the basis of the number of positive Covid-19 cases and the size of the state/UT. Rs 7,774 crore is expected to be released for immediate response.
